data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Dindigul access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dindigul, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dindigul, Tamil Nadu, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Dindigul with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 23,758 believers in the county of Dindigul the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

Father, I pray that the Ambalavasi Tottiyan Naicker people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Ambalavasi Tottiyan Naicker people know you.
Father, move the 23,758 believers in the county of Dindigul to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Dindigul, Tamil Nadu, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dindigul, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 2,159,800.

We estimate Dindigul has 23,758 people who might know Jesus, 26,206 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,109,837 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Dindigul, Tamil Nadu, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
